value.title: Notion Data
value.toolTip: Any specific settings for the Notion data system.

value.title: Default API key
value.toolTip: The default API key to use for notion data asset downloads unless overriden on the asset.

value.title: API key
value.toolTip: The API key to use with the download.

value.title: Database link
value.toolTip: The link to the page with the database on that you want to download.

value.title: Override API key
value.toolTip: Should the asset use a different API key from the default one assigned?
